europeana:record.dc:title: A revision of the Genus Lobophytum von Marenzeller (Octocorallia, Alcyonacea)
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Verseveldt J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
europeana:record.dc:description: In this revision of the genus Lobophytum 46 valid species are recorded. Owing to my visits to several museums I could examine most type-specimens; of only four holotypes (L. batarum, L. borbonicum, L. lighti and L. rotundum) the depository is unknown to me. One new species, L. hapalolobatum, is described. A list of invalid synonyms and varieties is inserted, and five keys may be helpful in identifying the corals.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A revision of the Genus Lobophytum von Marenzeller (Octocorallia, Alcyonacea) (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 200) (Issue 1)
